title: Merry Christmas
body:
Hi all

I would just like to say a big Merry Christmas and Happy New Year

I'm relatively new to this game and so far have spent my time solely playing blind pick I think its called and have been thoroughly enjoying it thus far.

Hats off to the developers, fellow gamers both friend and foe and look forward to many more enjoyable games in the future.

Kind Regards

FunRun
